name: A day in the life (Chocolatto, Khite, saokodc08, G_b_G)
name_original: A day in the life (Chocolatto, Khite, saokodc08, G_b_G)
description:
Have you ever live to experience 365 days? Or you just live to experience 1 day 365 times?

Have you ever wonder as if everything go according to what is in your head?

As for this green guy, sometimes he just wants what he has imagined to be real!

This game is created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022. Thank you and we hope you enjoy our game!
